= Quick Start =
#
 # Copy BinaryDiffer.plw to IDA plugins directory
  # Start BinaryDiffer.exe
 # Start up two IDA sessions and open binaries to diff to each IDA session
  # Initiate BinaryDiffer plugin in each IDA session(Edit -> Plugins -> ”Binary Differ”)
 # When the analysis is done, you can see "Matched Functions" tabs.
  # If you click the matches to analyze, it will show graph view of the function.
 # It has node colors painted

green-node with match in the other binary
yellow-node with match in the other binary, but the node has difference
red-node without match in the other binary
